project_context.name: Carpenter SaaS (Marangoz Proje Yönetimi)
project_context.vibe: Swiss Utility meets Organic Craft. Precision tools for physical work.
project_context.theme_strategy: Light Mode Default (Clean, Workshop-Bright). High contrast for readability in dusty environments.

heading.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Modal titles. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Data tables, form inputs, long text. Optimized for UI legibility.

primary.name: Industrial Timber
primary.description: Deep, earthy brown-grey. Represents stability and wood. User customizable.

secondary.name: Workshop Clay
secondary.description: Warm amber/orange for accents and high-priority alerts.

rules: Status colors must use 'subtle' variant (bg-light + text-dark) for badges.
Primary action buttons use the Tenant Brand Color.
Dashboard backgrounds should be 'Canvas' (white/off-white) to let data pop.

grid_strategies.dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6 (The Control Room Grid)
grid_strategies.detail_view: grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8 (2 cols content, 1 col meta/actions)

containers.card: bg-white border border-border rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

buttons.primary: rounded-md font-medium shadow-sm hover:opacity-90 transition-all active:scale-95

inputs.style: rounded-md border-input bg-transparent shadow-sm focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-ring
inputs.label: text-sm font-medium leading-none peer-disabled:cursor-not-allowed peer-disabled:opacity-70 mb-2 block

navigation.sidebar: w-64 border-r bg-background h-screen sticky top-0 flex flex-col
navigation.item: flex items-center gap-3 rounded-lg px-3 py-2 text-muted-foreground transition-all hover:text-primary hover:bg-muted

visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-lg for dropdowns/modals. Avoid massive drop shadows.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. Only for sticky headers or floating action bars. backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 border-b.
visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise or grain on the Login Page background to give it a 'material' feel.

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Consistent sizing (w-4 h-4 for meta, w-5 h-5 for nav).

login_bg.alt: Modern carpentry workshop with light streaming in
login_bg.usage: Full screen background for Login/Register with overlay.

empty_state_tools.usage: Empty state for 'Work Items' or 'Production' list.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 for normal text. Use Slate-600+ on white.
accessibility.focus: Visible ring-2 ring-offset-2 ring-primary on all interactive elements.
accessibility.labels: All inputs must have visible labels or aria-labels.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Ensure 'Manrope' and 'Public Sans' are imported in index.css or via Google Fonts.
2. THEME: Implement the 'Industrial Timber' primary color as a CSS variable (--primary) to allow for the Multi-tenant/User color customization requirement.
3. LAYOUT: Build the 'Dashboard Layout' with a collapsible Sidebar and a Topbar for User Profile/Notifications.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components (Card, Button, Input) to match the 'Swiss Utility' aesthetic (sharper corners, distinct borders).
5. NOTIFICATIONS: Implement the WebSocket connection in a global context/hook and use 'Sonner' for real-time toasts.
6. LANGUAGE: All UI text must be in TURKISH (Giriş Yap, Projeler, Ayarlar, etc.).
7. STATUS: Create a reusable 'StatusBadge' component that maps the status keys (bekliyor, planlandi...) to the specific color palette defined.
8. RBAC: Ensure UI elements (buttons, routes) are protected by a 'PermissionGuard' component based on the user's role.

do_not: Do not use gradients for text.
Do not center-align long text blocks.
Do not use generic 'Lorem Ipsum' - use realistic Turkish carpentry data (e.g., 'Mutfak Dolabı Montajı', 'Ahmet Yılmaz').
must_do: Handle loading states with Skeletons, not spinners.
Keep the UI 'Dense' but 'Airy' - high information density with good padding.
